stripped_text: When you rez Chimera, choose sentry, code gate, or barrier. Chimera gains that subtype until derezzed. When a turn ends, derez Chimera. Subroutine End the run.
text: When you rez Chimera, choose sentry, code gate, or barrier. Chimera gains that subtype until derezzed. When a turn ends, derez Chimera. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Chimera
